creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by H. Ed Robison, in memory of his beloved wife Ulrike Pietzner Robison
description: kneeling woman with white towel around neck holding melon or squash on her lap with both hands; woman is facing viewer; wears straw hat, blue and purple button up blouse, and blue and purple patterned skirt with apron
marks: Signature, Title, Date, and Marks LLC, in grey: [Ohayo Gozaimas Lady]; LRC, in penci
title: Ohayo Gozaimas Lady
